title: Part A

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

  • As the mitotic index decreases, the percent/number of cells (with chromosomal or mitotic abnormalities) increases.

  • As the mitotic index increases, the percent/number of cells (with chromosomal or mitotic abnormalities) decreases.

  • There is an inverse/negative relationship.

The response includes an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

  • As the mitotic index decreases, the percent/number of cells (with chromosomal or mitotic abnormalities) increases.

  • As the mitotic index increases, the percent/number of cells (with chromosomal or mitotic abnormalities) decreases.

  • There is an inverse/negative relationship.
